definitions.body: : 2Sa 7:17 vision (on format. cf. Lg:BN 200)—abs. ´[[ח]] 2Sa 7:17, Is 22:1, Is 22:5; cstr. [[חֶזְיוֹן]] Job 20:8, Job 33:15; sf. [[חֶוְיׁנוֹ]] Zec 13:4; pl. abs. [[חֶוְיׁנוֹת]] Job 7:14, Joe 3:1, cstr. id. Job 4:13; —
vision, in the ecstatic state ´[[ראה ח]] Joe 3:1; ´[[ח]] ([[א]])[[גּי ]] valley of vision Is 22:1, Is 22:5.
vision, in the night [[לַיְלָה]]([[וֹת]])[[חֶזְיוֹנ]] Job 4:13, Job 20:8, Job 33:15; ‖[[חֲלֽמוֹת]] Job 7:14.

divine communication in a vision, oracle, prophecy: ‖[[דברים]] 2Sa 7:17 ( = [[חזון]] 1Ch 17:15); [[יֵבשׁוּ אִישׁ מֵחֶזְיׁנוֹ בְּהִנׇּכְֽאׂתוֹ]] Zec 13:4 they will be ashamed, every one of his vision when he prophesieth.
